444910.name: Void 21 Demo
444910.description:
Void 21 is a procedurally generated, arcade style, fast-paced runner and shooter. You are a pilot training with the highly maneuverable and lethal Void ship. Your objective is to reach the end of the level, either as quickly or as violently as possible (or both?).

We are firm believers in the try before you buy model. As such we encourage you to download and play the demo version of Void 21 before making any sort of financial commitment.

Key features:
- 30 Procedurally Generated Levels to try out
- Ship pre-loaded with the Chaingun MKI and the Homing Missile MK1 side weapons, as well as the Ship Width Projector Special
- 13 enemy and obstacle types to challenge your skills
- Multiple challenging enemies with unique AI
- Targeting max resolution of 4K@144FPS

Game can run at unlocked framerate and any available resolution.

Future Items:
- Mac and Linux Support
444910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
